text: Sterling Knight (born March 5, 1989) in Houston, Texas. is an American actor, and singer. He is in Sonny With a Chance as Chad Dylan Cooper. He also in plays Christopher Wilde in Starstruck. He will be playing Ty Parker in the upcoming movie Elle: A Modern Cinderella Tale. ==Personal life== Sterling Knight was born in Houston, Texas. He has a younger sister, Samantha Scarlett, and a younger brother, Spencer Shuga. He lived in Texas before moving to Los Angeles, California to keep going with his acting career. Knight had acted in many Houston theater plays like On Golden Pond, Lost in Yonkers, Bye Bye Birdie and Mad Adventures of Mr. Toad.. ==Filmography== Year Television Role Notes 2006 Hi-Jinks Brendan Episode "Winner" 2007 Hannah Montana Lucas (Lilly's Boyfriend) Episode "My Best Friend's Boyfriend" The Closer Grady Reed Episode "Next of Kin: Part 1" Episode "Next of Kin: Part 2" 2008 Out of Jimmy's Head Brad Episode "Bad Fad" Grey's Anatomy Kip Episode "Freedom" 2009â€“present Sonny With a Chance Chad Dylan Cooper Main cast Year Movie Role Notes 2009 17 Again Alex O'Donnell First film role 2010 Starstruck Christopher Wilde Disney Channel Original Movie Elle: A Modern Cinderella Tale Ty Parker In-the-making (2010) 2011 Transit Shane In-the-making (2010-2011) Year Music Videos Role Notes 2008 "La La Land" Paparazzo Music video by Demi Lovato 2010 "Something About the Sunshine" Himself Music video by Anna Margaret "Starstruck" Christopher Wilde Film role ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Disney actors Category:Actors from Houston Category:1989 births Category:Living people
